title: As a BOC Admin User, I want to return a submitted game report back to a Team Coordinator
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC Admin
AND viewing a submitted game report

Wire: https://zpl.io/2pjQEey
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the "Return to Fed" button
custom_expected:
THEN the Report will return to Preliminary state
AND the Team Coordinators will be able to edit the Report and resubmit

title: As a MLB Club User, I want to open a Published Pitcher Report in ebis
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in eBIS


Wire: https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=pitcher_modal
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to a pitchers report
custom_expected:
THEN The modal will match the provided wire
AND the values will match the corresponding report in the WBC Portal

title: As a user, I only wanted supported positions added to the final roster
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC or Fed Admin
custom_steps:
AC:
- Modal to choose Player Type if not a "supported" position. This should only set their Player type on the game report. Not actually change their position on their profile.

title: As a user I want to import middle names
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC Admin(Spreadsheet and create new player) or Fed Admin(create new player)
custom_steps: WHEN importing players via spreadsheet or matching
custom_expected: THEN if middle name is available in link we should populate that field in their profile.

title: As a user I want to import players with two first names
custom_preconds: GIVE user is logged in as BOC Admin
custom_steps: WHEN attempting to import players via spreadsheet or through matching with two strings as a first name
custom_expected: THEN both first names will be imported

title: As a user I want additional fields added to spreadsheet imports
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is viewing the upload spreadsheet template
custom_expected:
THEN the following fields will be available for upload via spreadsheet
- POS
- Bats
- Throws
- Weight
- Height

title: Attempt to add an unsupported position to a game report
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC or Fed admin
custom_steps: WHEN adding a player to a game report with an unsupported position
custom_expected:
THEN a drop down will be displayed to update a players position
AND they will be added to the game report with the selected POS
BUT this should only set their Player type on the game report, not actually change their position on their profile.

title: Final Roster Position Rule Check
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC or Fed Admin
custom_steps: WHEN adding a player from the provisional to the final roster
custom_expected:
THEN Only allow supported positions to be added to each position slot
AND if the players position is set to a coaches position a modal will launch prompting the user to update their position
AND Donâ€™t allow final roster players to have position changed (via profile or interest list)

UTL - Everything but pitcher
PH & DH - Only Infield and Outfield
OF, LF, RF, CF - Only outfield
IF, 1B, 2B, 3B, SS - Only infield
C - Only catcher
LHR, LHS, RHR, RHS - Only Pitcher

title: As a MLB Club User, I want to see Published Game Reports in ebis
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in to eBIS as Club

Wireframe: https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=club_communication
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the WBC club comms screen
custom_expected:
THEN the club Comms screen in ebis will be only be populated with Published Game Reports
AND reports displayed will be limited to those with players in the users org
AND if a BOC User is viewing the widget, they will see all published reports
